subject: Missing mounting hardware for pedal baseplate
description_text:
Hi Simsonn,

I purchased a set of Plus X pedals with the baseplate as well as haptic
motors

It arrived yesterday, and looks amazing, but I can't locate the mounting
hardware for the base plate and heel plate.

There are two bags of bolts, washers and nuts, which seem to be for
mounting the pedals to the base plate, and to mount the haptic motors.

I attached two pictures of everything unpacked, and made sure nothing else
is in the box or packing foam.

My order number is SSN4128.

Hope you will be able to help me.

Best Regards
Andreas Kragelund
